question: [File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: new()] [Validation Missing] Does any method validate the relationship between num_shards and max_partitioning_rounds (e.g., total combinations <= some limit), or can extreme values cause combinatorial explosion? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: num_shards()] [Range Check] Can num_shards be set to 1, effectively disabling sharding, or to a value that doesn't match the expected hardware thread count, causing poor performance? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: cross_shard_dep_avoid_threshold()] [Boundary Conditions] What happens when threshold equals exactly 1.0 - are threshold >= 1.0 checks implemented correctly with proper float comparison semantics? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: build()] [Error Propagation] Does build() return Result<Box<dyn BlockPartitioner>, Error> to handle initialization failures, or does it panic on invalid configurations, making it impossible to gracefully handle errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Builder Pattern] [Error Recovery] If a builder method receives invalid input, does it return Result or panic, and can partial builder failures leave the config in an inconsistent state? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Comment: V1 Config] The comment mentions this is 'V1' after 'aptos_block_partitioner::v2' is added - can using the V1 config with V2 partitioners or mixing V1/V2 configs across validators cause compatibility issues? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Struct: PartitionerV1Config] [Migration Path] When migrating from V1 to V2 configs, can validators end up with mismatched configurations during the transition period, causing partitioning inconsistencies? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Struct: PartitionerV1Config] [Serialization] Does PartitionerV1Config implement Serialize/Deserialize, and if so, can malicious serialized data inject invalid field values that bypass runtime validation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: cross_shard_dep_avoid_threshold] [Float Serialization] When serializing f32 threshold values, can precision loss during JSON/binary serialization cause deserialized configs to have slightly different values? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: cross_shard_dep_avoid_threshold] [Deterministic Execution] Can different compilers, CPU architectures (x86 vs ARM), or optimization levels (-O2 vs -O3) cause f32 threshold comparisons to produce different results, breaking consensus? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Struct: PartitionerV1Config] [Hash Stability] If PartitionerV1Config is used as a HashMap key or in hash-based lookups, can float field instability cause non-deterministic behavior? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: new()] [API Misunderstanding] Can developers mistakenly believe new() returns a fully-initialized config ready for use, when in fact num_shards=0 makes it invalid? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Builder Pattern] [Required Fields] Does the builder pattern enforce that required fields (num_shards) are set before build() can be called, or can build() be called on incomplete configs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: cross_shard_dep_avoid_threshold] [Dependency Resolution] Can manipulating the threshold cause the partitioner to incorrectly classify cross-shard dependencies, allowing conflicting transactions to execute in parallel and causing state corruption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: partition_last_round] [Last Round Handling] If partition_last_round=false, are all last-round transactions placed in GLOBAL_ROUND_ID, and can this cause unexpected sequential execution bottlenecks degrading network throughput? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: build()] [Execution Integration] When the built BlockPartitioner is used by ShardedBlockExecutor, can mismatched num_shards between config and executor cause transactions to be routed to non-existent shards? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: max_partitioning_rounds] [Round Coordination] If max_partitioning_rounds exceeds the number of rounds the executor expects, can this cause the executor to skip transaction chunks or misinterpret round IDs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: max_partitioning_rounds] [Computational Complexity] Can setting max_partitioning_rounds to a large value cause O(rounds * shards * transactions) complexity to explode, creating a DoS condition during block preparation? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Field: num_shards] [Thread Pool Exhaustion] Can num_shards exceeding available CPU cores cause thread pool exhaustion, context switching overhead, and validator slowdowns? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Struct: PartitionerV1Config] [Invariant Violations] Are there any invariants between fields (e.g., num_shards must be power of 2, threshold must be > 0.5) that are not enforced, potentially causing downstream logic errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Function: build()] [Precondition Check] Does build() have documented preconditions (num_shards > 0, threshold in [0,1]), and are these checked at runtime or only documented? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Derive: Debug] [Debug Info Leak] Does the Debug implementation print sensitive configuration values that could leak information about validator setup or partitioning strategy to potential attackers? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Struct: PartitionerV1Config] [Test Coverage] Are there sufficient tests validating edge cases (num_shards=0, threshold=NaN, max_rounds>8) to prevent regression bugs in config validation? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/execution/block-partitioner/src/sharded_block_partitioner/config.rs] [Comment: V1 Config] [Backward Compatibility] When V2 config is added, can old validator binary versions using V1 config interoperate with new validators using V2, or will partitioning incompatibility cause network splits?
